game.name: PlanetSide 2
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, MMO, PvP, 온라인 PvP, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud
game.shortDescription: PlanetSide 2 is an all-out planetary war, where thousands of players battle as one across enormous continents. Utilize infantry, ground and air vehicles, and teamwork to destroy your enemies in this revolutionary first-person shooter on a massive scale.
game.shortDescriptionEn: PlanetSide 2 is an all-out planetary war, where thousands of players battle as one across enormous continents. Utilize infantry, ground and air vehicles, and teamwork to destroy your enemies in this revolutionary first-person shooter on a massive scale.

reviewHighlights.text: 빙글빙글돌아가는 '지상' 탈것이 날아다니거나, 뚱땡이가 날아다닌다면 그즉시 게임을 끄십시오.
